TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ParameterDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of a parameter within a query relative to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ParameterDirection values are used by the parameter direction properties of <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameter> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.ParameterDirection Input = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The parameter is an input parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.ParameterDirection InputOutput = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The parameter is capable of both input and output.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.ParameterDirection Output = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The parameter is an output parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.ParameterDirection ReturnValue = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The parameter represents a return value from an operation such as a stored procedure, built-in function, or user-defined function.
